Metadata: A Newsletter for the Mississippi Bar Section on Natural Resources, Energy and Environmental Law. No other issues of this newsletter title were received by the NSGL

This second 2013 newsletter reports on legal issues affecting natural resources, energy, and the environment in Mississippi. Articles in this issue: U.S. Supreme Court considers logging discharges under the Clean Water Act; Land use permit conditions must be proportional with effects of proposed use; A benefit to match the burden: The new aboveground storage tank program; 2013 Legislative Summary.
